page.title: 16Weather
page.content: There cannot have been a bigger contrast in the weather between 1984 and 1985. Rainfall to August 31st 1984 was 5.74 inches under the average. Rainfall to August 31st 1985,after a mild spring,was 0.54 inches over average. We must admit that a very dry period similar to that of last year would have been detrimental to water supplies,but we seem now to have had more than our share of summer rain and gale force winds.Even when the clouds lifted and the sun came through,the cold winds brought down the temperature.Will these winds ever cease?
